title: Rabbit and Steel Tier List
description: This is a tier list for the classes in the game Rabbit and Steel. The list is based on my own opinion and experience, and your mileage may vary.
heading: Rabbit and Steel Tier List
introText: This is a tier list for the classes in the game Rabbit and Steel. The list is based on my own opinion and experience, and your mileage may vary. I have also included some additional factors to consider when choosing a class. Ultimately, the best class for you is the one that you have the most fun playing.

data.itemDescription: The Dancer is one of the most powerful classes in the game, thanks to their ability to deal high damage and crowd control multiple enemies. Their ultimate ability, Encore, is a devastating attack that can wipe out entire rooms of enemies
The Defender is a tank class that can take a lot of punishment and protect their teammates. They also have a number of skills that can crowd control enemies, making them a valuable asset to any team
The Ancient is a versatile class that can deal damage, heal allies, and crowd control enemies. They are a good choice for players who want to be able to do a bit of everything
The Druid is a support class that can heal allies and provide buffs. They also have a number of skills that can crowd control enemies, making them a valuable asset to any team
The Spellsword is a hybrid class that can deal damage and cast spells. They are a good choice for players who want to be able to do both
The Bruiser is a melee damage dealer that can deal a lot of damage up close. However, they are slow and squishy, making them easy targets for enemies
The Sniper is a ranged damage dealer that can deal high damage from a distance. However, they are very fragile and need to be careful not to get caught out in the open
The Heavyblade is a melee damage dealer that can deal a lot of damage, but they are very slow and have short range
The Assassin is a melee damage dealer that can deal high burst damage, but they are very fragile and have to get close to enemies to deal damage
